sense.def:
To support someone or their aims
pomeni strinjati se z nekom in mu poskušati pomagati, da bi mu uspelo.

seg.quote: A lot of building workers supported the campaign.
His work colleagues refused to support him.
The party declared its support for the campaign.

sense.def:
To support a sports team
pomeni želeti, da bi neko športno moštvo zmagalo, in morda redno spremljati njegove tekme.

To give support to someone
pomeni biti prijazen do nekoga in mu poskušati pomagati, ko je v težavnem obdobju.

seg.quote: They find it hard to give their children emotional support.

sense.def:
Kadar nekaj
supports an object
, je pod določenim predmetom in ga drži pokonci.

seg.quote: ...the steel girders that supported the walkway.

sense.def:
A support
je tisto, kar podpira nekaj drugega.

seg.quote: Most large scale buildings now have steel supports.

sense.def:
To support oneself
pomeni oprijeti se nečesa, da ne pademo.

seg.quote: I clung to the outside edge of the door to support myself.
She was standing behind the ladder and holding on to it for support.

sense.def:
Financial support
je denar, ki ga dobi podjetje ali organizacija, da lahko nadaljuje s proizvodnjo ali dejavnostjo.

seg.quote: These industries were dependent on state support.

sense.def:
To support someone
pomeni nekomu dajati denar ali stvari, ki jih potrebuje.

seg.quote: He has a wife and three children to support.

sense.def:
Kadar dejstvo
supports a statement or a theory
, pomaga dokazati, da je trditev ali teorija resnična oziroma pravilna.

seg.quote: There was simply no visible evidence to support such a theory.
Scholars have found little support for this interpretation.
